item.title: Welcome to WBEC Pacific’s New Website
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: Redesigned from the ground up, our new corner of the internet provides increased functionality, versatility, and accessibility features to help make your time on our pages quicker, easier, and friendlier.

item.title: Janice Greene: A woman everywhere, all at once
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
Janice Greene is always focused on the role each person plays in the bigger picture, she said.
Throughout her 39-year career at Boeing, and now in her current position as the President and CEO of Women’s Business Enterprise Council Pacific, Greene said if one role doesn’t work, then the rest of it won’t work.
“You have to be able to see the whole big picture,” Greene said, “how things fit together and that everybody is playing an important role.”

item.title: Game-Changing Business with WBENC Certification
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: Becoming WBENC certified has been a game-changer for my business. It has opened doors to conversations with companies I never imagined engaging with.

item.title: Board Member Spotlight: Tim McLaughlin
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
Tim is responsible for developing, maintaining and administering San Jose Water’s (SJW) Utility Supplier Diversity Program (USDP) and supports San Jose Water Group (SJW Group) Supplier Diversity Programs in Connecticut, Maine and Texas.
Tim currently serves on the Board of Directors for the Women’s Business Enterprise Council – Pacific, the Boy Scouts of America, Silicon Valley – Monterey Bay Chapter, the United States Pan Asian American Chamber of Commerce (Western Region) and the National Utility Diversity Council’s (NUDC) Advisory Committee. Tim served as President of the Industry Council for Small Business Development (ICSBD) from 2016 to 2019 and
